patthana22.28:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:5.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.28:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.28:11.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
